tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE customer_support_data (
  customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  support_tickets INT,
  customer_calls INT,
  support_notes TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE customer_support_data (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id UUID,
    ticket_id UUID,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    issue_description TEXT,
    resolution TEXT
);
CREATE TABLE crm_system_data (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id UUID,
    account_balance DECIMAL,
    subscription_status BOOLEAN,
    last_interaction_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Customer {
  customer_id INT,
  customer_name VARCHAR(255),
  customer_email VARCHAR(255),
  customer_phone VARCHAR(20),
  customer_address VARCHAR(255),
}

CREATE TABLE CustomerSupportTickets {
  ticket_id INT,
  customer_id INT,
  ticket_description TEXT,
  ticket_status VARCHAR(50),
  ticket_created_at TIMESTAMP,
}

CREATE TABLE CRMContacts {
  contact_id INT,
  customer_id INT,
  contact_name VARCHAR(255),
  contact_email VARCHAR(255),
  contact_phone VARCHAR(20),
}

CREATE TABLE CRMInteractions {
  interaction_id INT,
  contact_id INT,
  interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
  interaction_description TEXT,
  interaction_created_at TIMESTAMP,
}
